name: Cult of the Draglops
description:
Description

Blast your way through this fantasy sci-fi adventure as you seek more arcane power.

===========================================================

Controls

Movement: A and D

Jump: SPACEBAR

Fire Projectile: LMB

Activate Shield: RMB

Spawn Platform: E

===========================================================

Team 3

Derek (Programmer)

Jetro (Programmer)

Diana (Artist)

Levi (Artist)

Ruiguang (Artist)

Jyotsna (Artist)
